website_summaries.verdict: The Creative EP-630 earphones offer a comfortable and stylish design, solid audio quality, and handy sound isolation. They're a good value overall.
pros: The Creative EP-630 earphones are compact, comfortable, and relatively stylish, coming in a choice of five shimmery colors
They offer a reasonable amount of passive noise isolation and solid sound quality for the money
cons: The Creative EP-630 earphones are slightly lacking in bass for some songs, and they feel cheaply constructed, which raises concern for durability

customer_reviews.title: Best under $100 in-ear in the market, average bass
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - After trying different in-ears from different brands (e.g. Sony, Beats, Phillips, etc.) with the price of let's say less than even $100, I came back to my first choice, Creative EP-630. Its very clear in high-range and mid-range, but it's bass is mediocre. if you need a strong bass it might not be the best option, but I believe it's one of the most balanced in-ear in the market. Cons: - If you listen to music non-stop with high volume it might not last more than 6 months. - It falls off easy for some people.Definitely not a good idea for sports purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Mohammadhossein Firouznia

customer_reviews.title: Yes, yes, yes!!!  Thank you Creative Labs!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my Playstation VR because of the sound quality. These are by far the absolute best sounding buds for the price. Super clear highs and booming bass. I had bought a Dell laptop back in 2008... It came with a set of black ear buds that had what looked like an upside down V with a line underneath printed on them. THANK GOD I found out what company makes these!! My original pair from 2008 are still working fine and they've been run through the ringer. So I found these and got the white ones to match the PSVR. THANK YOU GUYS SO MUCH!! These really are incredible for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Z Noble

customer_reviews.title: Great Earbuds
customer_reviews.text: I love the earbuds because I can select which size ear piece I want to attach the part that goes into my ears. That is a fantastic feature. It does come with 3 options. Small, medium, and large. The sound quality is fantastic as well. The noise canceling is not great. I use them at work for webinars, and I can still hear my coworkers talking in the background. It’s distracting. It could be just me, and different for others. Overall, I would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: P. Coble

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I had another pair of Creative earbuds that lasted several years before a broken wire caused me to order a new set. This new set has nowhere near the level of output (maybe 70 percent?) of my older set. Dynamic range is really good, but loudness is not. I also bought a five dollar set from the "five down under" store, and they are almost as good as these. For $20, I'm not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: pchak

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound Quality, Small and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I've never been a fan of earbuds because they're typically uncomfortable and the sound frequency is too high. I bought these primarily for their size as I use them mostly at night, when sleeping. I have Tinnitus (ringing in the ear) and wanted a pair small enough to lay on my side. These are comfortable, small, and the sound quality is fantastic. The highs aren't too high, there's just enough bass and a comfortable mid range.
customer_reviews.author: kevinry

customer_reviews.title: Plenty good
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these and a pair of Sony extra base earbuds, looking for decent noise isolation. They both ended up working well. The Sony's are double the price, but they do have a richer sound, so that equals out. The sound from these is just fine, although if you are an audiophile, you might not be impressed. Probably the most important thing is to try out all 3 of the different size ends (the Sony's come with 4) and find the best fit.
customer_reviews.author: longmontmatt

customer_reviews.title: See's the difference!
customer_reviews.text: Compared to my previous headphones, with these I can hear the promised noise cancelation. I like how it came with 3 size rubber parts so it can fit your ear. Frequency 6-23,000 HZ on box with 16ohms. 16 ohms impressive, but I want to test 5-23,000HZ with JVC HA-FX1X Xtreme Xplosives. They have over 300 reviews. To sustain my headphones durability life, I super glued the areas where it can come loose. Pros: Very affordable. Sounds great! Very easy to disguinish between a standard mp3 format vs high bit rate format. Cons: Low volume can hear the distoration in high quality songs. P.S. I consider myself an audiophile.
customer_reviews.author: cmf

customer_reviews.title: Work great and a good value
customer_reviews.text: I bought these earbuds to wear with my ipod while walking and jogging for exercise. The buds that came with the ipod used to drive me crazy by constantly slipping out of my ears while I exercised. These not only sound much better than the original equipment buds, but don't slip out of my ears thanks to the silicone ear pieces. They have the perfect amount of noise isolation, enough to keep the music sounding good, but still able to pick up on traffic noise in the background for safety. I have been wrapping them around the ipod and they unwind nicely each time without kinking. I am so glad I bought these.
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: Good earphones
customer_reviews.text: The earphones have good sound quality. I wish the wires were a little thicker. They feel like tgey would break easily.
customer_reviews.author: WB

customer_reviews.title: Tinny sound, not enough base
customer_reviews.text: I'm not an audiophile, but to me the sound quality of Creative EP-630 is disappointing. It sounds thin and tinny. I'm surprise that the less expensive GOgroove Earbud Headphones has better base and a fuller sound. I mainly use headphones when at the gym where there is a lot of other noise.
customer_reviews.author: C. Toryu

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Good Quality at a Fair Price
customer_reviews.text: Update Received this item from Amazon. I stand by my original review, a good, solid performer at a fair price point. ================ After 7 years of daily use and several trips through the washing machine (oops) my trusty EP-630s finally gave up the ghost, the left speaker died. For the original price point (less than $20.00 iirc), these earphones performed remarkably well with overall good sound reproduction and decent bass bump. Good value for the money. They're still available on Amazon so I'm going to buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: Good Noise Cancelling Abilities
customer_reviews.text: I got these headphones because I work in an office with a vegetarian, and she is always eating crunchy veggies. I don't have anything against vegetarians, but veggies make a lot of noise when you eat them. Anyways, I put these headphones in, play some soft music, and I can't hear any crunching anymore. Problem solved! Highly recommend them for their legit noise cancelling abilities.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Feels great, long lasting
customer_reviews.text: I've had these over a year now and they still work great. I wish they were not quite so noise cancelling. So that is probably a good problem for most people.
customer_reviews.author: LeslieR

customer_reviews.title: slips out
customer_reviews.text: the sound works great and its good quality, the problem is any motion will cause it to fall out. would not recommend for jogging / running / activity, but if youre getting headphones for stationary listening this is great
customer_reviews.author: Akirax187

customer_reviews.title: My trusted earphones since 20+ years
customer_reviews.text: My first pair lasted for 20+ years. Love the comfort and clean design. The new pair's cussions are a little bit stiffer than the old one's, but still much more comfortable than any other. Luckily they are washable, durable and fit perfectly on the new pair, so I can still use them if I feel the need.
customer_reviews.author: Anu Ahjokoski

customer_reviews.title: Great earphones
customer_reviews.text: So much more comfy than those weirdly shaped air pods. Harder to lose too ;) Great product at a great price. Can't complain
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Good earbuds for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a LOT of ear buds and these are the first ones that actually stay in my tiny ears! I like that they come with a variety of sizes, and they muffle just enough outside noise that you forget about the leaf blower on the other side of the block. Great bargain.
customer_reviews.author: LexPam

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth the Price
customer_reviews.text: These earbuds lasted 4 months before one earbud died, and a few days after that, both earbuds stopped working. As far as my experience with earbuds goes (I usually buy ones in the $10-ish range), this lifespan is about average, but with a $20 price tag, I expected these to last far longer than they did. They're good quality before they die, but I won't be purchasing these again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not deep base
customer_reviews.text: It’s definitely not the deep base it claims on the packaging. I listened to a few songs that already have a deep base in the song just to test out the base quality and it didn’t do the song any justice at all. The noise cancellation is OK- I could hear my baby snore so it doesn’t cancel that out. I’m going to order other earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits well in my ears...
customer_reviews.text: I love the fit in my ears and the size - quite small ear buds.The nois isolation is very good too. However,I find the sound has a bit too much treble, a bit not enough bass.
customer_reviews.author: Fenix56

customer_reviews.title: i always buy the ep 630s and the seller i ...
customer_reviews.text: i always buy the ep 630s and the seller i was buying them in black from stopped having them. these are okay but the little bit of rubber on the jack came loose very fast. doesnt seem to make any differance in quality though.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Love these head phones
customer_reviews.text: I love the long cord and its in-ear feature, goes very well with my ipod shuffle. Long cord allows me to run without having the trouble to tangle my hand in the wire and the danger of throwing off my clip-on ipod shuffle.
customer_reviews.author: Dhindhin

customer_reviews.title: I have a few pair
customer_reviews.text: These are not performance earbuds, but for the price - I love them. I listen to podcasts, youtube, music while relaxing. They fit well, well made. I use them a few hours a day,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best ear buds
customer_reviews.text: Lost my Creative EP-630 the weekend without noticing and on Monday i found them on the chest pocket on a recently washed shirt. Yes, the buds were still functioning at 100% capacity without any damage on the quality. Simply the best ear buds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, true value for money with great quality
customer_reviews.text: Product is just perfect in price range, especially the ear hold which is soft and true ear shaped.
customer_reviews.author: Sushil

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Had to return these ear buds. Only used them twice and they started to cut out at the connector part that goes into my pc. Don't know if it was just a fluke and I got a bad pair or what.
customer_reviews.author: lovesherjrt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit. Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. Great sound. After buying 5 different kinds, I have gone any repurchased 5 pairs of these so I won't run out.
customer_reviews.author: Austinzxcv

customer_reviews.title: fits great, sounds great, better than Apple
customer_reviews.text: Creative is IMHO the best sounding earphones. They fit nicely in your ear, they come with different size silicone rubber pieces to fit different ears. They are darn cheap and and sound as good as most high-end Shure earphones. This is third pair in maybe 10 years and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable with nice sound
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and nice sound. If they become clogged use hydrogen peroxide and a q-tip to clean
customer_reviews.author: M. Gorson

customer_reviews.title: Earphones
customer_reviews.text: I owned a pair of similiar earphones from Creative for over three years and after two deployment the a wire broke to one of the ear piece headset. So I was impressed with the earphones and that is why I ordered another set.
customer_reviews.author: Brian D. Thimmig

customer_reviews.title: Best Headphones for the Money
customer_reviews.text: You could spend $40 or $140 on a pair of really nice ear buds, but these work very well for being so darn cheap. No, they aren't noise-cancelling/isolating (not sure if there's a difference between the 2), in that you can still hear some sounds around you. But if you can tune that out yourself, these are fine. Perfect for the gym, commuting, or anywhere that you wouldn't want to break or lose your really nice things. In all, a great pair of ear buds.
customer_reviews.author: OhRhodora

customer_reviews.title: Love these earphones
customer_reviews.text: Buy these up while you can; they no longer are in production. The stereo has terrific clarity, and the earbuds are actually comfortable in your ear. Light, easy to use, I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: cuecards

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I have been using a pair of these now for over a year. I use them almost every day. Very compact yet durable. Excellent for everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: FE Bird

customer_reviews.title: The Only Earbuds I Use For Music
customer_reviews.text: Stay in your ears perfect. Great for using during a workout. Good sound quality. No complaints
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Better than skullcandy
customer_reviews.text: Awesome ear buds. I usually buy skullcandy but these blow em out the water. Fits super snug. Great bass. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: nestor mozqueda

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: I've had a pair of these for 6 years, guys. 6 years and they held up amazingly! great sound, good bass, excellent clarity and balance. couldn't recommend enough. I think i'm going to buy 2 pairs...
customer_reviews.author: L.B.

customer_reviews.title: Music sounds great but you can hear every time it brushes against ...
customer_reviews.text: Music sounds great but you can hear every time it brushes against your clothing. I don't think they can be considered "noise-cancelling" if they actually cause noise.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: These are the best headphones for the price. They work really well, providing great sound, bass and noise isolation. I use them to run too and the earbuds are comfortable and they do not fall off your ears like others do. I will definitely recommend these to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: SapaJC

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones!
customer_reviews.text: These are my third headphones of this model. Pure sound, pronounced bass. When they break, I'll buy them again.))
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Nice.
customer_reviews.text: I received my item promptly and as advertised. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Alvin Harris

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I had been using the black version for quite a while and while I was very pleased with the comfort and sound quality of those headphones I decided I would rather have these in white. I was really happy to find them in white and am still very pleased with how comfortable they are and how clear the music is.
customer_reviews.author: Kakali Atkin

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this earphones after losing my previous Creative earphones. This is completely worth of the money I paid. Clear bass and treble, was good to distinguish every instrument in the track.
customer_reviews.author: ARUN JEEVANANTHAM

customer_reviews.title: Had 1st pair for 10 years, still worked perfect until I got the cord wrapped around a grinder.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound. Great fit. Right price. This is my third pair. Got first pair that I had for 10 years, without any problems, caught in a grinder. Lost the second pair and replaced immediately. Will buy again, until I decide to part with cash for wireless.
customer_reviews.author: bwalter

product_meta.title: Creative EP-630 Noise-Isolating in-Ear Earphones with Superior Audio Quality, Deep Bass, Clear Highs, and Soft Ergonomic Earbuds (White)
feature_bullets: Ultimate music clarity with 9mm Neodymium magnet transducer
Soft ergonomic silicone in-ear earbuds provide excellent noise isolation
Find the perfect fit with the extra set of alternate sized earbuds, included
1.2m Oxygen-Free copper cable for uninterrupted music transmission
Available in a variety of colors

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,061 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
